definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

sentences.english: Zhiwu Chen, a professor of finance at Yale, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁大学的金融学教授陈志武也赞同这一看法。

sentences.english: There's homeless people around Yale and New Haven.
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁和纽黑文附近有流浪汉。

sentences.english: She graduated from Wellesley College and Yale Law School.
sentences.chinese: 她毕业于韦尔斯利学院和耶鲁大学法学院。

sentences.english: We could make thousands of locks a day in, uh, Yale & Towne.
sentences.chinese: 那时候在耶鲁汤尼工厂，我们一天可以生产千把锁。

sentences.english: What is the endowment of Yale?
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁的捐赠基金是什么？

sentences.english: They strike me as less intellectually adventurous than the Yale students of today.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他们与如今的耶鲁学生相比心智没有那么活跃。

sentences.english: All of you, why did you come to Yale for a second semester?
sentences.chinese: 你们为什么会回到耶鲁来上第二学期的课？

sentences.english: I enrolled in Yale Law School in the fall after the riots .
sentences.chinese: 暴乱之后的秋季我进入了耶鲁法学院学习。

sentences.english: Three will be graduates of Yale Law School.
sentences.chinese: 三名是耶鲁大学法学院毕业生。

sentences.english: Yale University has contacted Mr. Schmidt concerning these rumors.
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁大学就此谣言联系了斯密特先生。

sentences.english: Yale University Department of English and literature have been critical of the new school movement.
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁大学的英文和文学系曾属于新批判运动学派。

sentences.english: He attended exclusive school before Yale.
sentences.chinese: 他上耶鲁之前在贵族学校上学。

sentences.english: Is there any celebrity from Yale?
sentences.chinese: 有没有来自耶鲁大学的有名人士？

sentences.english: Yale is actually really big on smiling.
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁的确是酷爱微笑的学校。

sentences.english: The title comes from an address she gave at Yale in which she spoke of the  monument design process.
sentences.chinese: 片名取自她在耶鲁的一次关于纪念碑设计流程的演说。
在CCL的收藏中，那是耶鲁大学的高流通库。

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2
Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Da2 te4 mao2 si1 Xue2 yuan4
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2
